unnormalised: Actually, finding their new office wasn't easy. It's supposedly at 27/B, Sector 44, Gurgaon, Haryana, PIN 122003, but the building numbering is totally messed up there! After asking around for like 30 mins, turns out it's near the Huda City Centre metro station, opposite the old DLF building. Even the Google Maps location was off by a good 500 meters! Finally spotted their tiny board outside a gate.
normalised: Actually, finding their new office wasn't easy. It's supposedly at twenty seven slash B, Sector forty four, Gurgaon, Haryana, P-I-N one hundred and twenty two double zero three, but the building numbering is totally messed up there! After asking around for like thirty minutes, turns out it's near the H-U-D-A City Centre metro station, opposite the old D-L-F building. Even the Google Maps location was off by a good five hundred meters! Finally spotted their tiny board outside a gate.
